# gamefabric_volumestore (Data Source)


## Example Usage

```terraform
# Get a specific volumestore by its unique name.
data "gamefabric_volumestore" "fast_storage" {
  name = "fast-storage"
}
```


<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional (Exactly One Required)

- `name` (String) The unique object name.
- `region` (String) The name of the region the volumestore belongs to.

> **Note:** Exactly one of `name` or `region` must be specified. Do not specify both.
### Read-Only

- `max_volume_size` (String) The maximum volume size supported by the volumestore.
